name: spotify-controls
title: Spotify Controls
description: Control the Spotify app for macOS with your keyboard.
author: thomas

commands.name: playPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Toggles play or pause of current track in Spotify.

commands.name: previousTrack
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skips to the previous track in Spotify.

preferences.name: previousTrackNotificationEnabled
preferences.label: Show previous track info on change
preferences.description: Show previous track info on change

commands.name: nextTrack
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skips to the next track in Spotify.

preferences.name: nextTrackNotificationEnabled
preferences.label: Show next track info on change
preferences.description: Show next track info on change

commands.name: backwardXseconds
commands.title: Skip Backward
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skips backward x seconds in Spotify.

preferences.title: Skip x seconds
preferences.name: secondsToSkip
preferences.description: The number of seconds to skip forward or backward.

commands.name: forwardXseconds
commands.title: Skip Forward
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Skips forward x seconds in Spotify.

preferences.title: Skip x seconds
preferences.name: secondsToSkip
preferences.description: The number of seconds to skip forward or backward.

commands.name: copyUrl
commands.title: Copy Current Track URL
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Currently playing song's URL in Spotify.

commands.name: shufflePlay
commands.title: Shuffle Play
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Plays current track with shuffle enabled.
